replies.body: Good, people in OPL represent OCE - so they shouldn't be acting like clowns.
idk toxic behaviour seems to represent oce pretty well

Sadly true... have an upvote

Edit: Upvote is for CLG icon <3

Wow FlyingJoo just got {{summoner:14}}  by rito. But i agree, even pro players shouldn't be exempted from the rules that apply to us.  

Plz gift me an {{champion:268}} skin.

Despite Flying joo being a sub par player (even by Oceanic standards) I feel this punishment is quite excessive due to the general "toxicity" of Oceanic Solo-Queue and the relative time to the finals. Please consider these things in mind, Riot Oceania, when making a competitive ruling and maybe Oceania may have a chance at competing against other regions (but probably still not).

Tell me what region doesn't have toxic players in solo-queue?? I think all regions need to be harsh on summoners that break the code, especially pro players regardless of where they are. Since they are in the spotlight and set an example for new and current players.
What happens ((In the unlikely chance now)) that Legacy makes it to Wildcards, Do those games count towards his 6 game ban?
